ZEGO_APP_ID.description: ZEGOCLOUD App ID: Get your AppID from ZEGOCLOUD Console [My Projects] : https://console.zegocloud.com/project

ZEGO_SERVER_SECRET.description: ZEGOCLOUD ServerSecret: Get your ServerSecret from ZEGOCLOUD Console [My Projects -> project's Edit -> Basic Configurations] : https://console.zegocloud.com/project

FA_PROJECT_ID.description: Firebase Admin SDK, project_id in the Private-Key-File json: Get your Private-Key-File json from Firebase Console [Project settings -> Service accounts -> Firebase Admin SDK -> Generate new private key] : https://console.firebase.google.com/

FA_PRIVATE_KEY_ID.description: Firebase Admin SDK, private_key_id in the Private-Key-File json: Get your Private-Key-File json from Firebase Console [Project settings -> Service accounts -> Firebase Admin SDK -> Generate new private key] : https://console.firebase.google.com/

FA_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Firebase Admin SDK, private_key in the Private-Key-File json: Get your Private-Key-File json from Firebase Console [Project settings -> Service accounts -> Firebase Admin SDK -> Generate new private key] : https://console.firebase.google.com/

FA_CLIENT_EMAIL.description: Firebase Admin SDK, client_email in the Private-Key-File json: Get your Private-Key-File json from Firebase Console [Project settings -> Service accounts -> Firebase Admin SDK -> Generate new private key] : https://console.firebase.google.com/

FA_CLIENT_ID.description: Firebase Admin SDK, client_id in the Private-Key-File json: Get your Private-Key-File json from Firebase Console [Project settings -> Service accounts -> Firebase Admin SDK -> Generate new private key] : https://console.firebase.google.com/

FA_CLIENT_X509_CERT_URL.description: Firebase Admin SDK, client_x509_cert_url in the Private-Key-File json: Get your Private-Key-File json from Firebase Console [Project settings -> Service accounts -> Firebase Admin SDK -> Generate new private key] : https://console.firebase.google.com/
